column3: Sport;Tehran: Cambodia’s hopes of qualifying for either the 2022 FIFA World Cup or the 2023 AFC Cup are all but over after an historic first leg in Iran.------The Angkor Warriors were humiliated as Iran found the back of the net 14 times
column4: with Cambodia failing to score. Keo Sokpheng missed a penalty at 47 minutes.------This appears to one of the ------biggest victories in international football------ although way behind Australia’s 31:0 drubbing of American Samoa in 2001.------Meanwhile
column6: for the first time in the Islamic Republic’s history
